attributes.additional_details:
People have the freedom of choice and should not be forced to pay for something they do not wish to pay for! No other company can force it's citizens to pay for services they do not wish to use.

It is wrong and should be made illegal to force. It should be made optional and subscription based just like every other choice. 

It's propaganda and the BBC have bisaed views and provide services that many many people do not want are watch but yet they are forced to pay for.
attributes.background: The television license is an old obsolete system and is charged people for a service many do not wish to have . It's a system set up that does not merit the cost and enforcement on the people of this country.
